info.cardinalboats.cancel: Primed turn cancelled. Player left boat.
text.autoconfig.CardinalBoat.option.doCh: Print primed turn logs to chat
Prints primed, completed, and cancelled messages to the chat.
text.autoconfig.CardinalBoat.option.main:
Maintains forward velocity on Primed Turns, similar to the snap key.
May not work well on laggy servers.
§4OP as f§ku§r§4ck, may get you banned.
